Author: Prasad \cite{Prasad2007}
Approach: Mesh the shape; join midpoints of the triangles
Advantages: Any shape can be the input
Limitations: Dependence on triangulation;  gaps at the end

Author: Fischer \cite{Fischer1997}
Approach: Midpoints at normal intersection; B-spline fitting

Author: Zhu \cite{Zhu2015} \cite{Zhu2016}
Approach: Midpoints at normal intersection; surface fitting
